Homehero.1: We are glad to welcome you to the 'Rever' hotel, which is famous for its oriental hospitality and is located in the very center of Tashkent!

AboutHotel.1: The Rever Hotel in Tashkent is one of the best branches of the Shosh hotel chain, a lot of useful services will make the stay of city guests very pleasant and comfortable.
AboutHotel.9: Proximity to attractions such as Bodomzor Mosque, Tashkent TV Tower, Japanese Garden, Tashkent Botanical Garden makes the Rever Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Tashkent.
AboutHotel.10: Prices at the Rever Hotel are much lower compared to a number of hotels in the city of Tashkent, but the services provided by our hotel are at the highest level.
AboutHotel.11: Guest rooms offer private bathrooms and televisions, and Rever Hotel makes getting online easy as free high-speed wifi is available.
AboutHotel.12: You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including room service. In addition, guests can enjoy free breakfast. Additional convenience for guests is free parking and transfer of guests.
AboutHotel.13: Want to explore the city better? You don't have to go far for this. The State Museum of Applied Arts of Uzbekistan and the State Museum of the History of Uzbekistan are popular attractions in Tashkent, which are within walking distance from the hotel.
AboutHotel.14: We wish you a pleasant time in Tashkent!

Terms.1: Hotel policies are general and may vary depending on the type of accommodation chosen. Children of all ages are allowed. Children aged 12 and over are considered adults. Pets are allowed. Charges may apply.
Terms.3: Cancellation and prepayment policies depend on the selected rate plan. Please enter the dates of your stay and review the terms and conditions of your reservation. Basic rate plan: You can cancel your reservation free of charge up to 24 hours prior to arrival. Non-refundable rate plan: You pay prepayment in the amount of the full price of the stay on the day of booking. In case of cancellation, the prepayment is not refundable.
Terms.7: Basic rate plan: You can cancel your booking free of charge up to 24 hours before the start of your search. Availability on the day of order.
